title: Internal baths and showers
fullText:
Three zones (Zones 0, 1 and 2) are classified for baths and showers as follows:
(a) Zone 0 shall be the area of the interior of a bath or a shower base.
NOTE A shower base may be defined by either a raised hob or a depression in the floor.
(b) Zone 1 shall be the area of the interior of a bath or a shower up to the height of the ceiling.
(c) Zone 2 shall be the area limited by â€”
(i) the vertical plane limiting Zone 1 and the parallel vertical plane 0.6 m external to Zone 1; and
(ii) the floor and the horizontal plane to the ceiling.
See Figure 4.7 (a), (b), (c) and (d).
The requirements for selection and installation of electrical equipment in these zones are provided in Table 4.3.
